alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:03PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central St. Louis County through 730 PM CDT... At 702 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Canyon, or 15 miles north of Cloquet, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pike Lake Near Duluth and Hermantown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
